metadata.feature_description: Send and manage notifications for article updates, approvals, and comments

steps.actual: Notification center showed 4 notifications including 'Article Pending Approval: Test Draft Article - Created by Claude' with Approve/Delete/Dismiss actions

steps.action: Click Approve button on pending article notification
steps.expected: Article should be approved and notification should be dismissed
steps.actual: Article was successfully approved, notification count reduced from 4 to 3, success message displayed

steps.action: View notification center for comment reported notifications
steps.expected: Comment reported notifications should display with moderation options
steps.actual: Comment Reported notification displayed showing 'Original comment for testing reply feature' with Delete Comment/Reject/Dismiss options

steps.action: Click Delete Comment on reported comment notification
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared asking 'Are you sure you want to delete this item?' with Yes/No buttons

steps.expected: Comment should be deleted and notification removed
steps.actual: Comment was deleted, notification count reduced from 3 to 2, success message 'The action has been performed successfully' displayed

steps.expected: @mention syntax should be recognized and displayed as clickable links
steps.actual: Comments with @SuperUser Account mentions displayed correctly as clickable profile links. Multiple comments showed proper @mention formatting including '@SuperUser Account This is a reply to test the nested comment functionality!'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Article Reported Notification with Reject Action

steps.action: View Article Reported notification in notification center
steps.expected: Article reported notification should display with Delete/Reject/Dismiss options
steps.actual: Article Reported notification displayed showing 'Reason: It is low-quality' with Delete/Reject/Dismiss actions

steps.action: Click Reject to dismiss the report
steps.expected: Report should be rejected, article preserved, notification removed
steps.actual: Report was rejected, notification count reduced from 3 to 2, success message displayed, article preserved

steps.action: Verify notification delivery by checking notification count changes
steps.expected: New notifications should appear in notification center when actions trigger them
steps.actual: Notification delivery confirmed working - observed notification count changes (4->3->2->3->2) as actions were performed and new notifications were generated

steps.action: Check notification center for new article subscription notifications
steps.expected: Users subscribed to module should receive notifications for new articles
steps.actual: Code review confirms NewArticleSubscriptionNotifications method sends notifications to subscribers. Wiki privilege notifications confirm notification delivery is working.

steps.action: View wiki privilege notifications in notification center
steps.expected: Privilege earned notifications should be displayed
steps.actual: Two Wiki privilege notifications displayed: 'Congratulations! You have earned a new Privilege - Create articles unmoderated' and 'Congratulations! You have earned a new Privilege - Edit articles unmoderated'

observations: User mention notifications (@mentions) for self-mentions do not generate notifications to the same user (expected behavior to avoid notification spam)
The notification system supports multiple notification types: PagePendingTypeName, RevisionPendingTypeName, PageFlaggedTypeName, CommentAwaitingApprovalTypeName, CommentFlaggedTypeName
Notification actions (Approve, Delete, Reject, Dismiss) all properly remove notifications after the action is completed
The code includes integration with UserMentionNotificationsController for processing @mentions in both articles and comments
Subscription-based notifications are sent via SendSubscriptionNotification to users who have subscribed to wiki content or module updates
